Action.author: manish-sethi
Action.body: ~nirro - while onto this, can you add one more check towards the end - which is that the transaction (endorsed in step 4) should actually be marked as invalid during commit (because, a chaincode upgrade has taken place between endorsement and commit). As a result, the final state of the private data on org1 and org2 should be also be same as before this transaction.

Action.author: c0rwin
Action.body: ~nirro have you covered this item in your series of private data CRs?
